Key Match Events: Matanovic scored in the 36th minute for Croatia
Kramaric scored in the 70th minute for Croatia
Christie scored in the 33rd minute for Scotland
Hanley received a yellow card in the 8th minute
Gilmour received a yellow card in the 90+4th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland is seeking to end their long winless streak
Croatia is aiming to secure a place in the knockout phase
Croatia began their Nations League campaign with a 2-1 defeat in Portugal
Croatia's captain Luka Modric scored a stunning free kick to secure a win against Poland
Croatia has won six of their last eight Nations League matches and their last three home games without conceding a goal
Scotland has been winless in eight competitive matches, the longest streak in Scottish football history
Scotland's last victory was against Gibraltar in a friendly
Miscellaneous Highlights: Saturday's match marked the first meeting between Croatia and Scotland since Euro 2020
Scotland emerged unbeaten from two previous visits to Croatia, drawing 1-1 in October 2000 and winning 1-0 in June 2013
